wikipedia_page.main: Muriel Hine (18 January 1874 – 16 June 1949) was a prolific British novelist.

response: Son of Thomas Chambers Hine of Nottingham, with whom he studied from 1858, and was in partnership from 1867 to 1891.  He married in 1870 and had two children, Dr. Thomas Guy Macaulay Hine, and Muriel Hine the novelist.
